R

range() - Method in record class io.shiromi.saml.tools.Range
Returns the length of the match, equal to either end - start or the length of the matched string
Range - Record Class in io.shiromi.saml.tools
Instances of the record class Range store the range of a String match inside StringType, this class also is used heavily inside StringType.split(String, int), allowing splitting using a String delimiter.
Range(int, int) - Constructor for record class io.shiromi.saml.tools.Range
Creates an instance of a Range record class.

RangeException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception class io.shiromi.saml.exceptions.RangeException
Constructs a new exception with the specified cause and a detail message of (cause==null ? null : cause.toString()) (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause).
